name: so i heard you're a fish
name_original: so i heard you're a fish
description:
Made in one hour for Sosowski's Sudden Death Game Jam on May 2, 2018.

Made in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.

Made with the assistance of image to bitsy by ruin.

If you think you'd like to play another recent game by me that is also about fish, consider looking at koi puncher mmxviii.
